definition: a game played in an enclosed court by two or four players who strike the ball with long-handled rackets, to compress with violence, out of natural shape or condition
details:
noun
- a game played in an enclosed court by two or four players who strike the ball with long-handled rackets
= example: a game played in an enclosed court by two or four players who strike the ball with long-handled rackets
- edible fruit of a squash plant
= example: edible fruit of a squash plant
- any of numerous annual trailing plants of the genus Cucurbita grown for their fleshy edible fruits
= example: any of numerous annual trailing plants of the genus Cucurbita grown for their fleshy edible fruits
= synonyms: squash vine
- a concentrated syrup, usually fruit-based, that is diluted to produce a drink
= example: a concentrated syrup, usually fruit-based, that is diluted to produce a drink
verb
- to compress with violence, out of natural shape or condition
= example: to compress with violence, out of natural shape or condition
= synonyms: squeeze
